examples:
เป็นปัญหาประเภทใด: อื่น ๆ

อธิบายถึงปัญหา: I would like a refund for my subscription, I cancelled the subscription before it renewed, but my debit card still got charged for it.
When I can't submit a refund request but can't send What do I have to do to get my money back? Please please.
And i haven't used any service yet  the app now, too

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello,

I just got billed for a month of Canva Pro but I canceled immediately and would like to know if it's possible to receive a refund. I have not used the subscription and can't afford it at the time. 

Thank you, 
<NAME>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I canceled my pro subscription but see it already went through at 1:30am this morning. I am currently unemployed and can't afford the payment. Can you please refund my money? I haven't used my account in a couple weeks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not realize I had signed up for this subscription and I can't afford it nor do it use it very often.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I lost track of when my canva subscription charge was going to go through for some reason I thought it was tomorrow. Can I please have the subscription cancelled and be refunded for at least 11 months? I don't need it right now and unfortunately can't afford it.

Thanks, Terra Van Zant

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, i just wanted to try the free trial, I did not want to be charged for continuing to use the service. It's a great program but my company will not reimburse me for it, and I can't afford it on my own. If you could please reimburse me that would be really wonderful. Hopefully some day in the future I can afford the plan. Thank you!!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled my account on January 16, 2021 at and it was only due to charge on the 17th. I cancelled before the charge should have happened. Now it says that my subscription will continue until 2022. I lost my job due to the pandemic and can't afford this. 
Can you please refund the purchase?

Thank you
Sherri

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello there, I don't wish to continue with the subscription past the trial period which ended today and I was automatically charged.  May I please get a refund.

I just can't afford that right now and wouold appreciate your understanding as things are very difficult for me financially at the moment.

Thank you, <NAME>
Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello! I want to get a refund for my subscription. I can't afford it yet. very expensive, but I need money now.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I just tried out the premium subscription and can't afford to continue it. I forgot to cancel the subscription before it renewed. Please refund my payment. Thanks!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I got charged for Canva pro even though I had cancelled before time for the free subscription period. 

Please refund the  amount as I can't afford to spend $119  and also don't plan on using Canva pro in the future.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I am sorry but I cannot afford the subscription at this time and I was not able to cancel yesterday before the trial period deadline, which was yesterday.  I was out of town and can you please refund me the 119.40 because with this covid situation I lost my job and I just can't pay that right now. Please let me know.  <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: The subscription automatically renewed. I have not used Canvas since the first time I was trying it. I have no use for a whole year of it. I can't afford $120 charge to my account

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was pretty sure that I canceled this subscription. I have not used this service since last year in July. I can't afford to pay for a service that I'm not using. Please refund my monthly fee and cancel my subscription immediately.  Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford $12.95. I need it for food this week. please issue me a refund, I am really broke. Will be back when I am financially stable

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I already submitted a request to cancel my trial before the 20th. I can't afford it and I don't use it enough to justify. I don't want it canceled in a year. I would like it canceled now and a refund please. This is going to mess up my bank account and my finances, which are not the same due to covid. Thank you very much. Paula Forgey

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford Canva. I stopped using it and canceled my subscription. Please refund my amount

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please, i can't afford that. I just wanted to see how canva works with the free trial, but I didn't realise my subscription was still active. I want a full refunf of the $107

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I remember canceling my subscription right after signing up for the free trial specifically to avoid getting charged. And yet I check my account recently saying it's still active and got charged again. Very unsatisfied and can't afford this.

Refund request reason: I have already cancelled subscription. It's charged yesterday only please issue refund. I can't afford the price.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I got laid off on Tuesday 1/26/2021. I used the service for funeral announcements for my uncle who died from covid. I appreciate the service but I can't afford to pay this I no longer have a job. Can you please refund me

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I do not want to continue my subscription with Canva at this time. Due to Corona I recently become unemployed and I can't afford it at the moment. Canva promised to sent me the reminder about the subscription payment but I did not receive anything. Please kindly refund me this one time.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Hello. I canceled my subscription today, but I'm already holding a hold on my account. I don't want to use canva for another month because I can't afford it. Can I have a refund to my account? best regards

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford this subscription at the moment, and was wondering if I could get a full refund.

Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for refund request: Hello, I accidentally hit get canva pro and the payment was made automatically. I don't want to have Canva Pro, I can't afford the subscription. Thank you

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Accept the 1 month free trial through the appstore, with the option to remember the deadline to cancel the subscription, I did not receive the reminder and I do not want the service, it is good but something expensive and I can't afford it, I forgot I had the 1-month trial active and I don't want to have the service, please give me the corresponding refund. Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm sorry I can't afford it at this time but I'll be back :) could you please refund this payment I forgot the trial was up.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I don't know why I was charged for a yearly subscription when all I did was log in to my canva account. I'm a 19 year old unemployed college student I can't afford this. Please give me a refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello. May I please be refunded my 119.40 for the yearly subscription. I will not be using the service for the year, and I am reaching out ASAP so hopefully there aern't any issues. Its a hard time right now I just can't afford a 120$ subscription to make photos.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I meant to cancel my trial version and was charged today.  I really can't afford this right now and would like to cancel and receive a refund.  Thank you!!!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I've been out of work since March last year and I can't afford this subscription. Please kindly consider refunding the £107.88.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I lost my job due to Covid-19 and can't afford to pay for Canva Pro at this moment. I am graciously asking to be refunded. Please understand the situation I have been put in. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello. Your email got in my SPAM. Kindly, Please please please. I can't afford such huge cost right now. I did not use it. I forgot that it was linked with my visa card. I am a yoga teacher so I thought it was free. Kindly let me know what I can do to have a refund. Regards Wilfrieda

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I don't use Canva I canceled my subscription 6 months ago right after the trial period, it was good I had no fees everything was safe, suddenly you charged your annual subscription ???? I don't want it, I don't need it, I can't afford it. Please, please help me and get my fee refunded, and please help me remove Canva once and for all. Regards, <NAME> Bronikowska

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't really afford Canva Pro at the moment. I'd like to cancel and get a refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I'm not sure how I ended up subscribing to this, but it has been in error if I did. Please refund me immediately as I can't afford this with lockdown etc.
Thanks 
S. Salt

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I should've cancelled yesterday but I forgot to do so. I have not used the premium features beyond the trial period. I am a student and can't afford to pay this. I would really appreciate if I could receive a refund.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Please can my subscription be cancelled and refunded.  I thought I had deleted my account already, but it renewed automatically,  and I genuinely can't afford this cost at this time.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Good morning! Please kindly cancel this charge on my card !!! I didn't even know I was using a Canva Pro trial (it must have been automatic without my knowledge) !!!!!!! If you look at my history, you can see that I didn't even use any resources! I kindly ask you to cancel this charge !!! I can't afford to pay that. I look forward to a return as soon as possible! Thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford to use canva pro right now.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: We can't afford this charge. We were not aware of the subscription we sign up for.
Invoice No .: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I saw that you charged me, but I do not wish to be subscribed, can I have a refund. I can't afford to pay for it. Thank you

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm so sorry I had the free 1 month trial, and was going to cancel it as i haven't used it much and its quite expensive and I can't afford it. However I thought I had until after Feb 4 to cancel it before being charged. Are you able to please refund it as i won't be using it and can't afford it.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not know you guys were taking my money. I looked around on mobile and can't find the cancel button. Please stop taking my money and give back this months fee. This almost put me in the negatives in my bank account. I love canva and you're an amazing tool but I can't afford you right now. Please. You got December from me free. I didnt even use the service i didn't know i was being charged for. Thank you for your help.

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: Please ask to cancel my subscription, it was automatically renewed and I don't want to and I can't have that expense right now. Please, I need a refund of € 107.88. I am not able to pay this subscription right now. Please ask for your understanding and refund. Thank you !

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, I completely forgot to cancel my subscription before the automatic payment went through. I am tight on money right now and really can't afford to pay for Canva currently, is there anyway I can get a refund on this month's charge? I do not need to use any features.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello! I love using Canva, but the automatic renewal overdrawn my bank account so I can't  afford this service right now but I will be investing in Pro as soon as I'm able to!

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I did not cancel the subscription on time. I like the product and will need it again later, but I can't afford it right now. Could you give me a refund? Thanks for your time

Account number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel my subscription, I cannot afford that amount now, please return the money! Written off today 28.01 at 10:30. From the card * 8999 Why can't I attach a screenshot ...

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I would please like a refund on my most recent renew of subscription. It was renewed on January 9th 2021. I haven't used Canva in a while and I can't afford it right now so I need a refund. Thanks.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I received a charge of $119 and I have no clue why. I don't remember subscribing to Canva Pro and I also changed my password just in case somebody got into my account. As much as I love Canva, I can't afford a subscription right now. I was shocked when I saw this charge

Refund request reason: I  was not aware that your service would automatically charge me, It wasn't clear. I can't afford this right now. please help me. i  was affected by the pandemic. I  really don't use this as much as i  thought i  would i  am okay with not using the features i  wont use them until i  hear back. plz help 

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford to pay it at this time.  I thought that I had cancelled the subscription.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi,

I thought I had canceled my subscription but I just noticed that it was auto renewing. My family and I got financially impacted by COVID-19 and can't afford the extra expenses.  Can you please issue me a refund for the months I have not been using  it. You can check my user activity/last <NAME>. Thank you in advance and hope you're having a great day!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am sorry. I lost track of the renewal date, and our small business can't afford this charge. Can we please get a refund? Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried to cancel before the renewal today, but I missed it by a few hours.
Please refund my full amount for the renewal, as I just can't afford it now.

Thank you kindly for this!
~Brian

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Reason for the refund request: Hello, I forgot to remove my free subscription and I didn't want to pay for the pro subscription because I can't afford it. I would like to be reimbursed as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and your response. Have a good day

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, hope you are well. I am quite on top of my subscriptions and trials, and I'm sure I cancelled the Canva one or didn't know it will auto-renew. I can't remember, and I apologize for not double checking. I am wondering if you could please refund me? Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I forgot to cancel the free promotion and I can't afford to have this money deducted.  Please return.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried the free trial. It said I would be contacted before I was charged. Then I just got an email from PayPal with the full year membership charge. I can't afford this right now and I didn't use the pro version as much as I'd thought I would.

Refund request reason: My husband lost his job, so we can't afford this subscription right now. Can I get a partial refund for my unused portion of my subscription?


Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm not interested in Canva after done My trial period and also I'm a student and can't afford Canva for now.

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I cancelled this, why was i charged? I can't afford it, i need a refund please.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I am not working and I can't afford it right now. I will come back soon!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can recall that I removed the automatic payment. So the reason to do this was to have a notification when the subscription ends and I could decide if I continue or not with it. Because of the pandemic I can't afford this subscription.
I would like the subscription refund

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford the Canva Pro especially in this time of pandemic. I was about to remove my card info but it was processed successfully. Please process the refund as I would use it to pay my bills. Thank you for your understanding.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: My subscription automatically renewed and unfortunately I can't afford the subscription at this time

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I forgot to cancel my subscription. I know this is on me but please, if possible, refund the 12 euros charged from my PayPal. I haven't used the website in over a week, I believe, and won't in future. Can't afford it. Thanks for your time :)

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I was deployed overseas and i got the Corona virus, was super sick, didn't have the chance to use the trial nor cancel. Plus, it charged me a whole year, i can't afford it.

Refund request reason: missed cut off day by 1 week or less. Can't afford this as we are all in Covid19

Refund request reason: The procedure to unsubscribe before is pretty complicated, even to find this option was tough. I tried plenty times to do it. Please help me with a refund. It's a huge loss i can't afford.

Refund request reason: I do not use Canva on a pro level I can't afford this

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I can't afford it now with no job due to the pandemic, I will be renewing the subscription when I become stable again with a steady income.

Invoice #: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: My subscription renewed automatically but I can't pay this year and I need a refund :-( I hope to be able to use CanvaPro again in a few months
